trans-unit.source: Building a Service Bus Client Application
trans-unit.target: Building a Service Bus Client Application

trans-unit.source: The following topic describes how to build a client application that connects to and uses a <token>sb2</token> service endpoint to communicate with the originating service.
trans-unit.target: The following topic describes how to build a client application that connects to and uses a <token>sb2</token> service endpoint to communicate with the originating service.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to create a SOAP-based client application that uses <token>indigo1</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to create a SOAP-based client application that uses <token>indigo1</token>.

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to create a REST-based client application that uses <token>sb2</token> and the <token>indigo1</token> web programming model, and how to create one application without them.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how to create a REST-based client application that uses <token>sb2</token> and the <token>indigo1</token> web programming model, and how to create one application without them.
